about.title: Our Story
about.description: EGEOD (Expert of Geospatial and Earth Observation Data) was born in 2025 from a passion for cutting-edge technologies and the conviction that big data and geospatial data have the power to sustainably transform our world.
about.mission: From its creation, the company has set itself a clear mission: to design innovative tools and solutions to meet the major environmental, economic and societal challenges of our time.
about.journey: Our adventure began with a certainty: Earth observation and intelligent data analysis are essential levers for understanding a constantly evolving world and providing concrete and impactful responses.
about.recognition: Since then, EGEOD has established itself as a trusted player, recognized for its technical expertise and proximity to its partners.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: The true strength of EGEOD lies in its multidisciplinary team: data, geoscience and innovation enthusiasts, united by a common ambition – transforming raw data into strategic levers for our partners.
team.commitment: Each project is driven by the complementarity of profiles and the desire to explore new perspectives, always with the same requirement: to offer solutions that are both efficient, sustainable and adapted to real field challenges.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We constantly explore new technologies and methodologies.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We aim for excellence in every project and deliverable.

engagement.title: Engagement
engagement.description: We are devoted to the success of our clients.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients and partners.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: At EGEOD, we believe in a world where geospatial data becomes a driver of sustainable development and territorial intelligence. Our ambition is to democratize access to this data and transform it into concrete solutions, capable of providing clear answers to the major environmental and societal challenges of tomorrow.
vision.future: Thanks to our expertise and innovations, we work for a future where space technology and Earth observation are essential levers for strategic decision-making and the preservation of our planet.

blog.title: Projects & Research
blog.description: Explore our cutting-edge research projects in earth observation, flood mapping, and geospatial data analysis.

floodMapper.title: Flood Mapper Package
floodMapper.description: A Python-based tool designed for rapid and flexible mapping of flooded areas using Google Earth Engine, leveraging Sentinel-1 SAR and Sentinel-2 optical imagery.

floodAnalysis.title: Mapping the Invisible: Flood Impact Analysis over Lomé (May 2024)
floodAnalysis.description: Leveraging Synthetic Aperture Radar imagery from Sentinel-1 to map and assess the extent of flooding disaster in Lomé, providing data-driven insights for urban resilience.

booksAnalysis.title: Books Reviewers Rating Analysis
booksAnalysis.description: Exploring what drives book review ratings using NLP, sentiment analysis, and causal inference modeling to analyze thousands of reader reviews.

landcoverSupervised.title: Supervised Landcover Classification of Sentinel-2 Imagery
landcoverSupervised.description: Comparison of Random Forest and Support Vector Machine algorithms for land cover classification from Sentinel-2 imagery over Corsica region using Google Earth Engine.

landcoverUnsupervised.title: Unsupervised Sentinel-2 Imagery Classification
landcoverUnsupervised.description: Land cover classification using unsupervised clustering methods (X-Means and LVQ algorithms) with Google Earth Engine and geemap package.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: Events and workshops are currently being planned. Stay tuned for updates!

resources.title: Free Resources & Tutorials
resources.description: Access our tutorials, tools, and interactive resources for earth observation and geospatial analysis

floodMapperGuide.title: Flood Mapper Quick Start Guide
floodMapperGuide.description: A comprehensive guide to setting up and using the flood_mapper package for rapid flood mapping using Google Earth Engine (GEE)

academicWebsite.title: Build Your Academic Website with Hugo Blox
academicWebsite.description: A step-by-step guide to creating your own personal academic website without coding using GitHub Pages and Hugo framework

floodMapperPackage.title: Flood Mapper Python Package
floodMapperPackage.description: Python-based tool for rapid and flexible mapping of flooded areas using Google Earth Engine, Sentinel-1 SAR and Sentinel-2 imagery

temperatureDashboard.title: Interactive World Temperature Dashboard
temperatureDashboard.description: Looker Studio dashboard showing spatial distribution of global surface temperature from 1940 to 2024 with interactive controls
